title: 114 - Doug Funnie: Big Sausage Pizza Delivery Guy
description: On today's show, the guys cover a myriad of topics before diving into a loaded Pod FOD that includes the alien revelations and whether there's any smoke or fire there,  which cartoon pizza always looked the best, Bill gives a run down on a few of his favorite Netflix serial killer documentaries, Mitt attempts to split the atom live on air, Armie Hammer is a grade A weirdo, and Nick comes back with Friday Bangerz locked and loaded after a week away. Don't forget to send your submissions and questions into the Pod FOD @ThePodPMI on Twitter and Instagram, and subscribe to youtube.com/thepatmcafeeshow to watch episodes of The Pod after becoming a member of the McAfee Mafia. We appreciate you all for listening, have a great weekend.
